question: Kavu or Sara Kavu is the local name of the scared groves of which of the following states?
explanation: Kavu or Sara Kavu is the local name of the scared groves of Kerala. They are total 299 in number. The site is inhabited by snakes. The area contains a representation of Naga Raja (King of the Snakes) and other Naga Devatas (snake deities), where offerings and rites are performed during special ceremonies.
